NAME: clearinvites
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to delete all invitations for a member or all members.
CONFIRM_ALL: {{loading}} Please confirm that you are sure you want to reset invitations for all server members. Click the confirm button to confirm.
CONFIRM_MEMBER: {{loading}} Please confirm that you are sure you want to reset the invitations of the mentioned member(s). Click the confirm button to confirm.
SUCCESS_ALL: All members's invitations have been successfully reset.
SUCCESS_MEMBER: The invitations of the mentioned member (s) have been successfully reset.
OPTION_MEMBER_DESCRIPTION: The member you want to clear invites for.
